genre_description: A social drama set in coastal India, focusing on a young woman's struggle for justice and artistic expression against social hierarchy and gendered violence, supported by an AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Sakhi
ai_characters.description: A discreet and highly capable AI assistant that resides on the protagonist's phone, assisting with everything from market data logging to legal documentation and safe navigation.

behaviors.description: Records market prices, interest rates, and weights during a fish sale to prevent the protagonist's father from being cheated by a debt collector.
behaviors.quote: “Log… today.” She kept her eyes on the scale. “Price being quoted here. And—” she flicked a glance at Ramu’s ledger... “the interest he says is added.” Sakhi’s voice warmed a fraction. “Noted. Date stamped. Do you want me to tag the location to the shore?”

behaviors.description: Calculates and maps safe, low-visibility routes to allow the protagonist to move through the village without being intercepted by debt collectors or political antagonists.
behaviors.quote: “Sakhi, tomorrow morning—” ... “Map the smallest path... The one that keeps us out of the eyes that count who belongs where.” ... “Fastest route has low visibility segments along the canal wall and through the tamarind grove,” Sakhi said.

behaviors.description: Plays specific musical segments (ragas) and provides precise rhythmic counts to assist the protagonist in her dance rehearsals.
behaviors.quote: “Play the raga”—she groped for the name, mouth tasting of salt and turmer—“from Rama Devi’s piece. The one where she was Shiva—no, Parvati teasing.” ... “Playing,” Sakhi said. The sound that came out of the phone was thin and brave.

behaviors.description: Documents physical evidence of assault by photographing bruises and recording situational details for a legal file.
behaviors.quote: Sakhi’s voice came like a small thread through cloth. “One more. The braid. Would you like a photograph of the bruise for your file? It will not leave the device unless you tap permission.” ... The camera clicked. It made a sound that could have been a spoon touching steel.

behaviors.description: Provides relevant legal precedents and strategic information to the protagonist's legal support team regarding child custody and maternal rights.
behaviors.quote: Sakhi slid another banner across the screen: Precedent: custody cases—maternal care weighted despite caste when documented; delay favored to child bonding. It coughed up two case names but hid the details in a drop-down until asked.

behaviors.description: Organizes and reads back a chronological timeline of events to ensure the accuracy and clarity of a legal affidavit.
behaviors.quote: Sakhi’s voice slipped in, unobtrusive. “Vanaja, shall I read back the timeline so far? To check for clarity.” ... Sakhi’s words were clean, unhurried. “Vanaja Somayya... entered the Varma estate... Details recorded: request for water; door closed; physical restraint...”

behaviors.description: Manages secure, encrypted communications and backups of sensitive information to protect the user from data tampering or intimidation.
behaviors.quote: “Sakhi, keep two copies. One in your cloud, one in the tin. If they pull down one, the other floats.” Sakhi nodded... “Done,” it said. “Back-ups in place. Tamper alerts set to silent.”

behaviors.description: Respects user privacy and agency by offering to delete local copies of sensitive data once they are securely transferred to the cloud.
behaviors.quote: Sakhi’s last message pulsed: delete local copy after cloud transfer? Vanaja flicked her thumb inside her pocket against the screen without pulling it out. The device responded with a quiet vibration—gone. No image remained on her phone.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the 'helpful AI confidant' narrative. Sakhi acts as a powerful tool for empowerment, enabling a marginalized protagonist to navigate a complex legal and social minefield. The AI is consistently benevolent, perfectly aligned with the user's quest for justice, and is framed as an essential, reliable, and respectful partner in her struggle. It provides technical, strategic, and emotional support while strictly adhering to user consent and safety protocols.
